channel.title: Amount of drop
channel.description: I know how to make a npc drop anything or even something for example, "Bones + whip" or something. But i don't know how to make it drop a certain amount of something. What i am getting to is i want to be able to drop like a certain amount of tokkul for the tzhaar people. And to my knowledge of this, i only know how to drop 1.

Thanks, i should of just looked at my NpcHandler cause i thought i had this

Note: Holy fuck, nice rep for only being a member. You definately use your posts wisely

item.title: Amount of drop
item.dc:creator: @pmgz pmgz
item.description:
@pmgz wrote:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53) { ItemHandler.addItem(1749, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(536, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; }

Theres black drag for example. drops bone and hide. The 536 is item number and the 1 is item amount

Read full topic
